AI Description: Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD) is a molecular visualization program for displaying, animating, and analyzing large biomolecular systems using 3-D graphics and built-in scripting.
Core Features: Visualization Of Molecular Structures, Animation Of Molecular Dynamics Simulations, Analysis & Manipulation Of Molecular Data, Integration With Popular Molecular Dynamics Simulation Packages
General Tags: Molecular Visualization, Molecular Dynamics, Structural Biology
